name: MeningococcalDiseaseTestsForNeisseriaMeningitidisInSpecimenFromNormallySterileSiteByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Meningococcal Disease (Tests for Neisseria meningitidis in Specimen from Normally Sterile Site by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Neisseria meningitidis in Specimen from Normally Sterile Site),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: meningitidis culture/isolate; Specimen = blood, CSF;  LOINC search: "Neisseria meningitidis (culture or isolate) -throat -unspecified"),(Exclusion Criteria: non-sterile specimen sources)
